pageContext.title: I help companies make employees happier, using data. AMA!
pageContext.content:
NOTE: This AMA has ended. Find the Q&A with Cheetung in the comments.

Hello Tech in Asia readers!

Iâ€™m CheeTung, and Iâ€™m the co-founder and CEO of EngageRocket, an HR tech SaaS company in Singapore. Prior to this, I was the regional director at Gallup, running business development in Southeast Asia.

At EngageRocket, we help companies build better workplaces with people analyticsâ€”using qualitative and quantitative people data to improve employee experience and performance, and ultimately showing the financial returns on that investment.

We work primarily with fast-growing and transforming companies with 200 to 5,000 employees, and have analyzed over half a million responses from people in 13 different markets in Asia Pacific. Weâ€™ve raised US$1 million so far over two rounds of funding and are the first venture-funded startup in Southeast Asia to link employee experience with performance and productivity.

Some questions you might want to ask me:

  • How do we ensure that we build a great culture in our team even as we scale fast?
  • What can we do to prepare first-time people managers?
  • What role can founders and leaders play in improving the employee experience, and what returns should they expect?

Note fromÂ Putra, TIAâ€™s head of community content:Â The host may choose at his preference to not answer particular questions. The AMA is moderated by the community managers, so letâ€™s keep the questions friendly.Â ðŸ™‚

seo.title: I'm Leong CheeTung, co-founder and CEO of EngageRocket. Ask me anything!
seo.description: CheeTung is the co-founder and CEO of EngageRocket. Ask him anything!
